author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: A Little Bit Of Love Transforms Poodle Who Was Living On The Streets
text:
A Little Bit Of Love Transforms Poodle Who Was Living On The Streets   
After living on the streets for who knows how long, Yankee Poodle seemed to have given up when Hope For Paws came to rescue him. But shortly after meeting a little boy with his foster family, Yankee Poodle springs to life! 
Itâ€™s amazing what a little bit of love can do!
